newsitem.title: UK: BOE allots 1.15 bln stg in outright bills, repo.
newsitem.headline: BOE allots 1.15 bln stg in outright bills, repo.

text.p: The Bank of England said that it provided the UK money market with 1.15 billion stg of assistance.
It allotted 209 million stg in bills outright and 941 million stg in repos to April 7 and 8. The repo rate is unchanged at 6.0 percent.
